description:
If you ever considered walking the Camino de Santiago, this 1-hour video course may be for you. 

Because in this course I am gonna give you the basic and essential information you need to: decide if this is for your & get startet with preparing for your journey.

We are going to tackle all the big questions that you have before doing such a journey of many weeks through a foreign country until you reach the famous cathedral of santiago de compostela. 

Come with me on this journey and enjoy - & maybe soon enough you'll find yourself on the road walking your own camino de santiago! 

Cheers, Christoph
title: Everything important about the Camino de Santiago
